place.name: BADGWORTH
place.gazetteerText: BADGWORTH, a parish in Axbridge district, Somerset; 3 miles SW of Axbridge, and 10 SE of Weston-super-Mare Junction r. station. Post Town, Axbridge near Weston-super-Mare. Acres, 1,815. Real property, £2,568. Pop., 279. Houses, 63. The property is sub divided. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Bath and Wells. Value, £482. Patron, SirMordaunt. The church is good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
